itunes:title: Evil Sorting Hat of Whiteness
title: Evil Sorting Hat of Whiteness
description:
Megan and Carrie talk with Dr JPB Gerald, host of Unstandardized English, a podcast about language teaching, race, and whiteness,  about his new book Antisocial Language Teaching: English and the Pervasive Pathology of Whiteness.
Want to edit video or audio? Try Descript:
https://www.descript.com?lmref=H1fP3g

Support the show

Contact us:

  • Tweet us @VocalFries
  • Email us at vocalfriespod@gmail.com

Thanks for listening and keep calm and fry on
